𒊭𒇷 šali; ša-li Säule @Saal "post, pole" ⇔ column

𒁴 DIM 𒁴𒈬 tim-mu Turm = post, pillar, pole; binding, knot, bond; plant
𒋻 TAR tower in 𒋻𒆰𒇻 tar-kul-lu pole, wooden post

𓊵 𓊪 𓏏 'peace' pāx pact 1900 BC all good top *peh₂ḱ- “fasten, place” ⇔ post bind

𒁍 púˡ "pole" баған bağan бағана 𒁍 gazinbu 𒂵𒍥𒅔𒁍 ga-zi-in-bu 杆子 gānzi κοντός kontós 𒁍 𒁍 gazamānu κάμαξ kámax खंभा khambhā عَمُود ʕamūd <> garrocha cuaille খুট্ট khuṭṭa
